EmailTemplate.description: Sent when IEP Bank Account Setup OSCAR is created

EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Sir/Madam,
We have well received your request for registering your Account for EasyPay services. Please proceed here to upload the requested documents.
Thank you,
IATA Customer Service Portal ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- Here is a link to the portal where the agent can submit the documents
